title: 'Trump's EPA' takes fossil fuel-friendly approach
description: WASHINGTON — The Trump administration has transformed the Environmental Protection Agency in its first year, cutting federal limits on air and water pollution and promoting fossil fuels, a metamorphosis that clashes with the agency's historic mission to protect human health...

title: Ancient meditation practices find new life
description: On most Monday nights, the sanctuary of All Saints Episcopal Church — with its vaulted ceilings, stone arches and stainedglass windows — seamlessly transforms into a space of quiet contemplation.
